about_the_game:
"Ice Cream!"

The presidency is in the past, and a new chapter is ahead for Joe... Will you be in it? The retirement home is a magical place, but it isn't without conflict! Ice cream isn't always available, and you may find yourself caught in the middle of a conspiracy...

Features

  • Ice Cream! 🍦
  • Romanceable Joe Biden 💕
  • Gilfs 👵
  • Big Wolf-men 😏

Gameplay

This game is a dialogue-driven visual novel where your choices matter! You only need one hand to click through the game 😏, as it's a classic visual novel. Like all visual novels, you can use just about any mouse on the market to click the left mouse button to progress the story and continue the dialogue and narration. Don't click too willy-nilly, though, you might regret your choices!

Future Plans


This is only the beginning! Stay tuned for upcoming DLC releases and, depending on your feedback, new episodes to the Love Love Joe Biden Saga!

legal_notice:
The voice included in the trailer (or any related promotional material for that matter) is not the voice of Joe Biden, and is AI generated.
This is not sponsored by or affiliated in any way with Joe Biden.

Song Featured in Trailer is: "Kirari Kirameku"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“It wasn't too long before Joe's eyes were fluttering away: But this time, it wasn't because he was sleepy. He confessed his love to my character, and I swore back that I would love him until the end.”
PC Gamer Magazine
short_description: Welcome to the retirement home! To win Joe's heart, you'll have to navigate the enticing world of gilfs, big hunky wolf-men, and sleepy presidents... Do you have what it takes?
